title: Space Development Agency issues draft solicitation for 100 satellites
summary: In a May 11 draft solicitation, the agency laid out its requirements for 100 “Alpha” satellites that will be part of a mesh network known as Transport Layer Tranche 2.

title: Media, Public Invited to Meet Solvers in NASA Space Food Challenge
summary: NASA will announce the second phase winners of its Deep Space Food Challenge, a global competition to help develop innovative food systems for future spacefarers on long-term exploration missions, on Friday, May 19.

title: Vulcan conducting launch day dress rehearsal as the final Delta IV Heavy arrives at Cape Canaveral
summary: Action finally returned to the United Launch Alliance’s (ULA) Space Launch Complex 41 (SLC-41) as the Vulcan-Centaur rocket rolled out to the pad on May 11 for further testing ahead of its debut flight. Meanwhile, ULA offloaded its final Delta IV Heavy rocket from their Rocketship vessel.

title: Eutelsat eager for OneWeb uplift as broadcast sales plummet
summary: A shrinking broadcast business led to another drop in revenues for Eutelsat as the French satellite operator edges closer to merging with OneWeb, the low Earth orbit constellation set to boost its shift into connectivity services.

title: NASA Sets Coverage for Axiom Mission 2 Briefings, Events, Broadcast
summary: NASA, Axiom Space, and SpaceX will provide coverage of the upcoming prelaunch and launch activities for Axiom Mission 2 (Ax-2), the second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station.
